entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
